summary: Als eindverantwoordelijke voor alle grootschalige investeringen en project ontwikkelingen ben ik altijd opzoek naar de balans tussen vernieuwing, inzet creativiteit en de stabiliteit van het bedrijf/project. Hierin de partners positief blijven verrassen resulteert in mijn ogen in een ultieme samenwerking. Ik heb een internationale Master (MSc) in Bouwmanagement met en sterke focus op finance en innovatieve contracten. Gestart als management trainee binnen Koninklijke BAM Groep, via de rol Financial Engineer/business developer ben ik in de periode van 2011 tot medio 2014 business-unit verantwoordelijke geweest bij BAM Utiliteitsbouw. In een kort tijdsbestek veel geleerd bij het professionele en succesvolle retail bedrijf Unibail-Rodamco waar ik binnen Benelux verantwoordelijk was voor alle grootschalige bouwprojecten. Heden bij het unieke bedrijf THE STUDENT HOTEL werkzaam als Chief Real Estate Officer en eindverantwoordelijk voor alle (nat. & internationale) investeringen en projecten in ontwikkeling.

At The Social Hub, we believe when people with vision and talent come together, we can create a better society. We design flexible spaces to learn, stay, work and play where our community can do what they do best. The Social Hub is a hotel for travellers, a home for next-gen students and professionals, a co-working space for big thinkers, a playground for entrepreneurs, and a meeting place for locals and friends.
So come on in, join us on this new chapter of our journey.
Whatever your journey, it starts here.
#TheSocialHub"

profile_positions.description:
As Chief Real Estate Officer I am responsible for sourcing, acquiring, developing and delivering turnkey unique and disruptive hospitality products. This includes the asset management of each unique location we have across the globe! 

As one of four Executive Board Members I am accountable for the Real Estate component within the company. Together we overseeing and steering this unique company to continue our sustainable growth, as we have been doing sofar. Together with our amazing team we are continuously innovating in other to stay head of the curve and being leader in hybrid hospitality. While ASG is essential for us we are specifically focussed to outperform the S of Social! Core values as bold, curious, entrepreneurial and conscious are driving us to be this disrupter in the industry!

profile_positions.company: The Student Hotel (now The Social Hub)
profile_positions.description:
As Chief Real Estate Officer I am in charge of initiating new projects/hubs and the development- and contant evolving- of the one of kind concept ‘The Student Hotel’. The Real Estate department is accountable from sourcing, acquisition, development, construction, until handing over the project/hub turn-key to the operational department of TSH. 

Additionally, I am part of the Executive Board of TSH. As board member we have a shared responsibility for the full company, from Developing new products/projects until optimising and constantly improving the operations of the products/hubs/hotels.

From sourcing, acquisition, development until having constructed the building and handing it turn-key over the in-house operational departments of the company. We are expending rapidly throughout Europe in several countries at the same time. On average we are adding 6 unique one of a kind new project to our portfolio a year.

profile_positions.company: The Student Hotel (now The Social Hub)
profile_positions.description:
As Director Real Estate Development I’m co-responsible for the international growth/expansion of the company. Development works closely together with the acquisition team who is responsible for identifying and purchasing new locations. The TSH development team is responsible for realising the project; defining the key elements of the location-specific TSH concept, lead the design-team, organising the zoning & building permits and managing the construction-process. All this with the focus on realising the next level of coliving/coworking facilities within the targets of the business case! As development director I lead an international team of 20 people; from the in-house design-team, Commercial- and Technical Development Managers as well as Construction Managers.

An average Project contains 400 rooms | 15.000m2. A TSH project can be a re-development, green-field or a brown-field project. In some situations we do area developments incl projects for 3rd parties. Regeneration of an area is one of our specialties. 

As director I’m part of the TSH Management Team
